text: By accident, I stumbled on this product a few months ago.  Absolutely love the Popchips BBQ Potato Chips.  I've tried ALL the flavors, but BBQ is my favorite.  I'm on Weight Watchers, and this is a great alternative to regular chips...and I don't feel one bit guilty after eating a bag!  I get the individual sized bags by the case...so they're always available.  Can't find them locally, but Amazon.com is the next best thing!
